event CurveCreated(address indexed owner, address indexed curveAddr, uint256 initMintPrice, uint256 m, uint256 n, uint256 d)
event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)

function createCurve(string _name, string _symbol, address _receivingAddress, uint256 _creatorRate, uint256 _initMintPrice, address _erc20, uint256 _m, uint256 _n, uint256 _d, string _baseUri, address _timelock)
